posts.post_content:
I am currently looking to purchase a T204 Ramly Mordecai and  a T-206 Portrait Mordecai with a Piedmont 150 back each around a SGC 40 or 50.  If you have one for sale, please email or PM me with pics and price.

Thanks,
Tony

still looking.

Happy & Healthy New Year to all!!!!

Tony
After your Dec, Feb & Mar bumps, my taking time to send an EM & make F & B scans and hold the card aside since 3-2,  the courtesy of a reply would not seem to be asking too much!
Theren are to backs gray and white  is one harder then the other to locate:)
What does that have to do w/ this thread--or my post?
Your T-206 Portrait Mordecai will have a great home with me! Thanks again.
How about on the next monthly bump add WTB in the title?  Thanks!

Fred,

To clarify, I did respond back to you the same day.  You did not provide me with front and back scans as you indicated.  My post reads Piedmont 150 backs for the Mordecai portrait.  You emailed me back and said "You only have PSA 4's with Piedmont 350's, will these do?"  

I don't know what you are crying about.

Regards,
Tony

That is COMPLETELY FALSE! You may have me confused w/ 3-2 Count, who responded to you right after me, or someone else!

My Mordecai is RAW w/ a Piedmont 150 back.

JB217676 (3 posts above) can verify my card---He just bought it!

Here are the T206 Mordecai Brown Portrait Piedmont 150 scans Fred emailed me yesterday. He emailed these to me 10-15 minutes after I had asked for them and we struck a deal about 30 minutes later. Fred is great and quick in his replies. Just a beauty of a card, can't wait to get it!!!

I apologize, I must have received an email from another Fred.  I can't seem to locate the email to verify the sender.

I'll be honest with you, I don't remember seeing an email for a raw Mordecai.  Sorry for the confusion.

Anyway, I'm still looking for a T204 Ramly Mordecai.

Thanks,
Tony

Apology accepted and no hard feelings--an honest mistake! 

My initial post was just intended to be a reminder for us ALL to be courteous & reply when someone takes the time to answer a request for cards & scans, that's all!

As a matter of record I keep those type of EMs and the one I sent you was at 8:40 PM on the same evening I sent you the PM on Tues 3-2-10.

Possibly got into your spam box--Whatever!

I can not help w/ the Ramly Brown. Hope you can find it.
